course_description: Methods and techniques commonly used to analyze financial statements of US and multinational companies: business strategy analysis, transaction analysis, assessment of earnings quality, financial ratio and cash flow analysis, credit analysis and bankruptcy prediction, forecasting accounting numbers and pro forma statements, and valuation using discounted cash flows, residual income, and market multiples.
sections:
